description: Composite HTML file for a web-based Database Viewer interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code for dynamic data fetching and rendering of database, table, and record data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles database expansion to show or hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables in a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data of a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates the HTML table structure and populates rows with data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses the cell content for long text or nested objects.
